TopicTitle: [1.0.4] [CKAN] Stella CTV: A stockalike CST-100 [Updated on 7-25-15]

Articles.Content:
**Stella CTV: a Stock-alike CST-100**

**Package includes**

Helios Service module

and RCS ports to match

Stella Command Module coming soon!

[![FRO6RIX.png](http://i.imgur.com/FRO6RIX.png)](https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/975/Stella%20CTV:%20A%20stockalike%20CST-100)

[**Download on Kerbal Stuff!**](https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/975/Stella%20CTV:%20A%20stockalike%20CST-100) ([mirror](https://dl-web.dropbox.com/get/Stella_CTV_A_stockalike_CST-100-1.2.zip?w=AAAQdr9tHjqZtW6NoIf54gq-nBGL0yVpBkMx7zZemg5dCA&dl=1&_subject_uid=436863927))

Also available on CKAN!

> 
> 
> 
> 1.3
> 
> **Added:**
> 
> SM functions now as a decoupler
> 
> Seperated the Service Module and Engines. The engines are called KS-88 and consume MonoPropellant
> 
> **Fixed:**
> 
> decreased thrust and Isp of RCS pods
> 
> Removed LqdFuel and Oxidizer from SM, increased MonoPropellant to 800
> 
> decreased mass of SM
> 
> decreased thrust and Isp of RCS pods
> 
> 1.2
> 
> **Added:**
> 
> Electric charge to the Helios Service module.
> 
> **Fixed:**
> 
> Names, and decriptions.
> 
> Changed:
> 
> RCS thrust has been lowered.
> 
> 1.0
> 
> **Added:** 
> 
> Helios, A 2.5m service module. 
> 
> RCS pods to attach to Helios
> 
>

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/PZLiM)

**Installation**

***Do not move or rename any files!***

Copy the files into GameData

Slam that play button!

**Special thanks to**

Reesew1221: Mod owner

Kartoffelkuchen: Modelling the Service Module

MOD EDIT: Locked at OP's request.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-13T14:31:32Z" title="08/13/2015 02:31  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 13, 2015</time> by Red Iron Crown**
textures for the cm are done atleast
is there any help needed for this mod??? i would love to help!!

> 
> is there any help needed for this mod??? i would love to help!!

sorry not at the moment but we will let you now if we need help. thanks for the offer
Reese1221's hard drive burnt up so dev is on hold, we had backups but it will take time to finish it...

> 
> how did it burn up...?

Reese said he started up his computer and he noticed some files missing. After a while his computer wouldn't run, so he switched the hard drive with a spare he had around, and it ran fine.
Everything is ok and fine i found backups!!!
